data.title: Simplifying application onboarding with Amazon CodeGuru Profiler
data.description: Amazon CodeGuru Profiler provides recommendations to help you continuously fine-tune your application’s performance. It does this by collecting runtime performance data from your live applications. It looks for your most expensive lines of code continuously and provides intelligent recommendations. This helps you more easily understand your applications’ runtime behavior so you can optimize their performance, […]

data.title: Nested Cross-Validation for Machine Learning with Python
data.description: The k-fold cross-validation procedure is used to estimate the performance of machine learning models when making predictions on data not used during training. This procedure can be used both when optimizing the hyperparameters of a model on a dataset, and when comparing and selecting a model for the dataset.
